name: Shanghai2022
description:
Shanghai2022 is a narrative game based on what is truly happening in Shanghai, China. In this intensive moment and disordered circumstance, choose your own way to experience the sufferings of those people. 

Notice: There will be sound effects, so, please control your volume. 

Bless Shanghai. 

Please follow this collective to see the real view: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLu750ZstqTLRb2Pa-Cv4_Dn7uJ9YKsdKI
